content: Whilst I donâ€™t much care about the others, Harriet Tubman should have an Arleigh Burke named after her for leading the Combahee River Raid in 1863. Leading a flotilla of three Union gunboats whilst under fire from Confederate troops she enabled the rescue of over 700 slaves. Had she been a Union Naval Officer she would have been put up for the Medal of Honor.
